title: 06/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Kevin Durant will never be considered the "Face of the NBA". He plays detective in order to figure out who Tom Brady was talking about when discussing the teams he considered signing with in 2020 free agency. He also compares Ben Simmons to an NFL QB who needs a change of scenery in order to reach his full potential. Plus, NBA Champion Stephen Jackson joins the show to talk about defending elite scoring in the NBA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
